lead_paragraph: The majority of Tommy John surgeries in this country were performed on teenagers.

headline.main: Baseball Is Injuring Too Many Kids

snippet: The majority of Tommy John surgeries in this country were performed on teenagers.
abstract: Op-Ed article by baseball columnist Jeff Passan expresses alarm at number of arm injuries to children in United States who play organized baseball, particularly among those who wish to play at elite level; calls on parents and coaches to do their utmost to protect young baseball players, particularly pitchers, from their own enthusiasm for game.
